mapper.insert: insert into article_images (article_id, url, uuid, flag_mission) values (#{articleId}, #{url}, #{uuid}, #{flagMission})
mapper.select: select a.id as article_id, a.user_id, a.create_time, a.flag_private, a.modify_time, a.room_id, ai.url, users.nickname, users.image_url, users.email_id from articles a left join ( select article_id, MIN(id) as min_id from article_images group by article_id ) as sub_ai on a.id = sub_ai.article_id left join article_images ai on sub_ai.min_id = ai.id left join users on a.user_id = users.id where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.flag_private = 0;

SELECT a.id AS articleId, a.user_id, u.nickname, u.email_id, u.image_url, a.content, a.create_time, a.modify_time, COALESCE(l.likes_count, 0) AS likes_count, GROUP_CONCAT(ai.url ORDER BY ai.id SEPARATOR ',') AS urls FROM articles a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_id, COUNT(*) AS likes_count FROM article_likes GROUP BY article_id) l ON a.id = l.article_id LEFT JOIN article_images ai ON a.id = ai.article_id where a.flag_private = 0 and a.user_id != #{userId} and a.user_id not in (select f.to_user_id from follows f where f.from_user_id = #{userId}) GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY likes_count DESC, a.create_time desc LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT a.id AS articleId, a.user_id AS userId, COALESCE(u.id, p.id) AS participantId, COALESCE(u.nickname, p.nickname) AS nickname, COALESCE(u.image_url, p.image_url) AS iconUrl, a.content AS content, a.create_time AS createTime, GROUP_CONCAT(ai.url ORDER BY ai.id SEPARATOR ',') AS urls FROM articles a left join participants p ON a.user_id = p.user_id AND a.room_id = p.room_id LEFT JOIN article_images ai ON a.id = ai.article_id left join users u on a.user_id = u.id and a.user_id = 1 WHERE a.room_id = #{roomId} GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};

select users.image_url, users.nickname, users.email_id, a.id as article_id, a.user_id, a.content, a.create_time, a.flag_private, a.modify_time, a.room_id from articles a left join users on a.user_id = users.id where a.id = #{id};

select users.nickname, users.email_id, users.image_url, a.id as articleId, a.user_id, a.content, a.create_time, a.flag_private, a.modify_time, a.room_id, coalesce(l.likes_count, 0) as likeCount from articles a left join users on a.user_id = users.id left join ( select article_id, count(*) as likes_count from article_likes group by article_id ) l on a.id = l.article_id where (a.user_id in ( select f.to_user_id from follows f where f.from_user_id = #{userId} ) or a.user_id = #{userId}) and a.id < #{offset} and a.flag_private = 0 order by a.create_time desc, a.id desc limit #{limit};
select case when count(*) > 0 then true else false end from article_likes where article_id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into article_likes (article_id, user_id, create_time) values (#{id}, #{userId}, now());
mapper.delete: delete from article_likes where article_id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: select al.user_id, users.nickname, users.email_id, users.image_url from article_likes al left join users on al.user_id = users.id where article_id = #{articleId}
select case when count(*) > 0 then true else false end from comment_likes where comment_id = #{commentId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into comment_likes (comment_id, user_id, create_time) values (#{commentId}, #{userId}, now());
mapper.delete: delete from comment_likes where comment_id = #{commentId} and user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: select u.nickname, u.email_id, u.image_url from comment_likes cl left join users u on cl.user_id = u.id where comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.insert: insert into article_reports (article_id, from_user_id, content) values (#{articleId}, #{fromUserId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select ar.* from article_reports ar where exists ( select 1 from users u where u.id = #{userId} and u.flag_admin = 1 )
